title: Rachel Duffy Wins a Game and Shares Sad News About Her Mom
summary: Rachel Duffy won a TV show called The Traitors and became the first woman to win it. She is from Northern Ireland. After winning, she shared that her mom passed away, which made her very sad. On the show, Rachel talked about her mom, who had Parkinson's Disease and dementia. She wanted to use the prize money to take her mom on a fun holiday and make happy memories with her family. Rachel's sister said this showed how kind Rachel is. The article tells us about Rachel's win and her feelings for her mom.
